Text:
In case some of you are wondering why this release is about 3 minutes shorter than other DSR & HDTV rips, it's because I cut out parts after the commercial break that were just repeating from before the commercial breaks to give it more of an "uninterrupted" flow.  parts like when Zak walks into the room with the noose, when the guys get scared out of the graveyard, and during their reveal of evidence to the elderly woman, Virgina, for example.  Basically whenever you see the TV PG icon pop up in the upper left corner is where my cuts were...

Oh yeah, this is also PS3 & X360 Ready.

Enjoy!
